title: swan97
author: swan97
content: This coin has huge potential!#TumpCoin, @TrumpCoinDTC, $DTCContract: ¬†0xAb8c98491816FEde394582f7758A5eFfeb4368d7Below is a note from the developer...WHY YOU SHOULD HOLD TRUMPCOINIn a few months from now Trump will be trending EVERYWHERE!! He will be trending on the news, social media, TV and everyone all over the globe will have his name in their mouth and in their thoughts, as he is the most entertaining and popular president (candidate) of the world.This does not mean that we won‚Äôt benefit from short term action.In fact, more people will look for Trump related tokens as the market is stabilising more and more, as Trump is gaining more relevance and popularity.Why am I so certain about our success?Everyone here knows that I do not like mentioning other crypto currency project‚Äôs, so let‚Äôs not do this again‚Ä¶ üòÅIn 2021 Elon Musk posted a Tweet saying that he‚Äôd buy a dog called Floki.Remember what happened after?@RealFlokiInu pumped to an All Time High of around 5 billion market cap after that happened just because they were the biggest and most known project in the space with a Floki related name.#TrumpCoin is the biggest and most known project in the space with a Trump related name as well.This means that your investment in TrumpCoin is very likely to pump after Trump gains more attention in the world.Why would you invest now?TrumpCoin is not just waiting for luck or miracles to happen. We are creating our own legacy with the help of our own initiatives.If you remember the very first days of our launch when many other projects tried to copy us, you‚Äôll notice that they‚Äôre ALL dead by now.None of them survived due to them not being as original and dedicated as us.We‚Äôre persistent, hard working, transparent and backed by some BIG whales.Why do you think Venture Capitals approached us in the first place?They know that once #Trump gains more popularity ALL Crypto investors will look for a ‚ÄúTrumpCoin‚Äù so why wouldn‚Äôt they invest in the one and only TrumpCoin!!!Let this sink in‚Ä¶

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: I can remember vividly about few days now when someone created a thread on this same discussion on Trump's coin and we don't really have the full confidence that they are truly coming from the presidential candidate official end or people are using such to gain massive attention or possibly scam unscrupulous users very desperate to invest on alts, all i have to say is for the people intending to invest on alts to make a thorough research before investing because scam rate is fast increasing.

comments.author: darewaller
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on June 27, 2023, 06:41:59 PMI can remember vividly about few days now when someone created a thread on this same discussion on Trump's coin and we don't really have the full confidence that they are truly coming from the presidential candidate official end or people are using such to gain massive attention or possibly scam unscrupulous users very desperate to invest on alts, all i have to say is for the people intending to invest on alts to make a thorough research before investing because scam rate is fast increasing. Never heard before that a president creates it's own crypto. I think they are too busy for it and they are rich already to still have an interest on selling a crypto. Projects like this are only a meme coin and I think I already heard of this before. Maybe they are only inspired to Pepe coin who failed at their first attempt but later on became successful. Great that you are concerned about the others but the question is, are those people feeling the same thing to you? They won't even thank you for that kindness your showing. Like it or not, there will always be people who choose to be greedy and they won't ever made their research before they invest in a crypto.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on June 27, 2023, 06:41:59 PMI can remember vividly about few days now when someone created a thread on this same discussion on Trump's coin and we don't really have the full confidence that they are truly coming from the presidential candidate official end or people are using such to gain massive attention or possibly scam unscrupulous users very desperate to invest on alts, all i have to say is for the people intending to invest on alts to make a thorough research before investing because scam rate is fast increasing. As the election will come again and people are starting to create another BS. i remember even people have been talking which candidate that will possibly to be a new president again. This kind of token was pure garbage scam token with no purpose. It's pretty much the same like a joke token. I can hope only once election will come and people will not be stupid enough to pick shit scam token like this. That reminds me with Ivanka trump coin, trump coin and many shit scam coin being made by yobit.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: X-ray on June 30, 2023, 04:29:08 PMQuote from: Doan9269 on June 27, 2023, 06:41:59 PMI can remember vividly about few days now when someone created a thread on this same discussion on Trump's coin and we don't really have the full confidence that they are truly coming from the presidential candidate official end or people are using such to gain massive attention or possibly scam unscrupulous users very desperate to invest on alts, all i have to say is for the people intending to invest on alts to make a thorough research before investing because scam rate is fast increasing. As the election will come again and people are starting to create another BS. i remember even people have been talking which candidate that will possibly to be a new president again. This kind of token was pure garbage scam token with no purpose. It's pretty much the same like a joke token. I can hope only once election will come and people will not be stupid enough to pick shit scam token like this. That reminds me with Ivanka trump coin, trump coin and many shit scam coin being made by yobit. Is this a new Trump coin or is the same which has existed since long ago? Not that it matters too much as whether it is one or more it will be undeniable that both will be a shitcoin, however I wonder if scammers are really out of ideas and are even recycling old coins just to try to deceive newbies into investing into their useless coins, however I doubt that it will have the same success it had years ago as I do not see the fans of Trump as excited as they were back then when he declared his intention to compete for the US presidency.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Lol another shitcoin but original name that's for sure. The creators will make some profit out of it because if they can get listed on some exchanges, you will always find people that buy it as they will think it will go x100 or even higher. I hope nobody on this forum will buy it as it seems a recipe to loose your money but we can't stop it. Every day new shitcoins are created and some even get listed on major exchanges.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: This is another shitty coin whose team wants to profit from the upcoming presidential elections, in which Trump will obviously take part. If this were true, then Trump would definitely have written about it on his Truth Social page, as he did earlier when NFT with his name were released.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: I saw a tweet recently where Elon Musk make a poll asking the twitter community if they would want to see trump back on twitter. Perhaps if that eventually happens, the first thing Trump will tweet about is this shitcoin so it will pump 2000% and also make American great again. ¬† Honestly I won't be surprise when suddenly this shitcoin will start pumping, crypto is full of the unexpected.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on July 01, 2023, 05:02:11 PMI saw a tweet recently where Elon Musk make a poll asking the twitter community if they would want to see trump back on twitter. Perhaps if that eventually happens, the first thing Trump will tweet about is this shitcoin so it will pump 2000% and also make American great again. ¬† Honestly I won't be surprise when suddenly this shitcoin will start pumping, crypto is full of the unexpected. Meme coins is market is full of project that is just leeching on current trend either personality, cartoon, or anything that is viral online. What really surprised me is the volume of liquidity being staked on the liquidity pool of this garbage token because some random meme coin that is newly listed on DEX sometimes get 1M or more liquidity which is a sign that many people still trust investing this coin.If I‚Äôm not mistaken, Trump coin or meme coin is already popular when he became president. This meme coin is just reviving it‚Äôs popularity after the recent action of Elon about supporting Trump to regain control of his Twitter account that is banned during the previous ownership before Elon bought Twitter.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: X-ray on June 30, 2023, 04:29:08 PMAs the election will come again and people are starting to create another BS. i remember even people have been talking which candidate that will possibly to be a new president again. This kind of token was pure garbage scam token with no purpose. It's pretty much the same like a joke token. I can hope only once election will come and people will not be stupid enough to pick shit scam token like this. That reminds me with Ivanka trump coin, trump coin and many shit scam coin being made by yobit. Yobit brings back memories. They listed anything and seems like they still do. I remember this happening first time trump was running. These kind of theme coins about presidental candinates were considered as good enough ideas for altcoins scams. And for some weird reason people were buying them back in then too.There were even country coins for every country and even city coins. Devs didn't need much effort to make a scam coin back then. All they needed is low level photoshopping and forking a coin. There weren't even tokens so everything had their own chain.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: This is just another scam coin cash grab utilizing buzz words.¬† There are plenty of "trump" coins already why would this be any different.¬† If anyone is looking at this coin and think they can possibly make money from it you might want to think twice.¬† You will probably just end up getting dumped on and left holding the bag.¬† I'd steer clear.

comments.author: SUPERSAIAN
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on July 01, 2023, 05:02:11 PMI saw a tweet recently where Elon Musk make a poll asking the twitter community if they would want to see trump back on twitter. Perhaps if that eventually happens, the first thing Trump will tweet about is this shitcoin so it will pump 2000% and also make American great again. ¬† Honestly I won't be surprise when suddenly this shitcoin will start pumping, crypto is full of the unexpected. I remember that Trump Token was created before in 2022. Now, as the American elections are approaching, Trump seems Trump everywhere. The social media platforms he created are social media supporters and trolls at the same time. He is a very strong businessman financially. Let me tell you something, I wouldn't be surprised if such a piece of shit makes a rise like you said, but I won't be upset.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on July 01, 2023, 05:02:11 PMI saw a tweet recently where Elon Musk make a poll asking the twitter community if they would want to see trump back on twitter. Perhaps if that eventually happens, the first thing Trump will tweet about is this shitcoin so it will pump 2000% and also make American great again. ¬† In fact, a similar poll was conducted last fall and following the results of the vote, Donald Trump account was restored. But despite the fact that Trump has more than 80 million followers, he has not returned to Twitter and still uses his account on the Truth Social platform, which was created with his money after being banned on Twitter.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on July 01, 2023, 05:02:11 PMI saw a tweet recently where Elon Musk make a poll asking the twitter community if they would want to see trump back on twitter. Perhaps if that eventually happens, the first thing Trump will tweet about is this shitcoin so it will pump 2000% and also make American great again. ¬† Honestly I won't be surprise when suddenly this shitcoin will start pumping, crypto is full of the unexpected. Why would trump who is trying to get his seat back in the white house finally come back to twitter only to tweet about this altcoin?¬† These coins and tokens are useless.¬† They rely on the popularity of something to make it pump.¬† Literally the definition of a pytlramid scheme.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: 2 months have passed , but what happened to your shilled project ?the only posts you created since your account was created is all about this coin https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3558367;sa=showPosts;start=20 and yes all you did is shilling from this project.nothing happened instead your shitcoin continues nothing .and stop depending this one because you are going nowhere but¬† failure to lure bitcointalk people.

comments.author: Alpha Marine
comments.body: If this was made to convince anybody then it did a very poor job. This is lazy work. One read at the post and you know the coin is shit. I don't know how there are people who buy into this BS.This just proves to people how weary they should be of most of these shitcoins. Most of them live up to their name. It was obvious this was just another meme coin that just wanted to rub people off their money. They're using someone's name to make money and the person has no part in the coin. That alone should make people stay away from the coin. They just want to take advantage of a situation.

We are creating our own legacy with the help of our own initiatives.If you remember the very first days of our launch when many other projects tried to copy us, you‚Äôll notice that they‚Äôre ALL dead by now.None of them survived due to them not being as original and dedicated as us.We‚Äôre persistent, hard working, transparent and backed by some BIG whales.Why do you think Venture Capitals approached us in the first place?They know that once #Trump gains more popularity ALL Crypto investors will look for a ‚ÄúTrumpCoin‚Äù so why wouldn‚Äôt they invest in the one and only TrumpCoin!!!Let this sink in‚Ä¶Is this promoting some coin or what? I haven't heard about any of the TrumpCoin Before, this is the first time I've heard it. Can you show us which big Whales have been invested in it? Is there any website, Twitter account, telegram, or medium of this TrumpCoin? So, we could get more information about the project. In which chain it is? I think you have posted a post, that has a lack of information through which we can't get to the point of what you mean. So, it would be better to post something extra or comprehensive about the TrumpCoin that you are promoting. Also, there are many more altcoin that is discussed daily.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: swan97 on June 27, 2023, 06:33:19 PMWHY YOU SHOULD HOLD TRUMPCOINIn a few months from now Trump will be trending EVERYWHERE!! He will be trending on the news, social media, TV and everyone all over the globe will have his name in their mouth and in their thoughts, as he is the most entertaining and popular president (candidate) of the world.This does not mean that we won‚Äôt benefit from short term action.In fact, more people will look for Trump related tokens as the market is stabilising more and more, as Trump is gaining more relevance and popularity.Yes, Trump is now trending but not in in a positive way, https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-61084161QuoteDonald Trump has been criminally indicted four times and will have a series of trials to attend in 2024 as he runs again for the White House.The crimes he is facing carry a maximum of 20 years imprisonment, so why would investors trust a coin where its inspiration is facing imprisonment if indicted, investors have enough of coins that got their inspiration from popular personalities, there's no use case of this project and there's no platform that will benefit the community so it can be considered a shitcoin.Investors are wiser now because of their past experience of investing in coins that thrives on shill marketing and with no contribution to the community.

comments.author: forexandcryptoauditor
comments.body: The name of the coin is really misleading. What is it to do with Trump? Does anyone should buy looking at Trump? Or is it the coin for his supporters?Whatever details are given, how at this stage can have confidence or trust in this project? If everything is good, down the line of six to seven months, we people may see the performance and then decide. I don't see enough details even for DYOR. One should be cautious thinking about this project.

If this were true, then Trump would definitely have written about it on his Truth Social page, as he did earlier when NFT with his name were released.I agree with you, maybe this is one of meme coin that uses the name of Trump if it's not Trump who made it, because the dev wants to make meme coin that he made can hype and popular, so he added the name of Trump, therefore I think it's very risky to invest in this altcoin, because the possibility of this altcoin becoming a shitcoin can happen and of course we can lose our money from investing in this altcoin.
